畏忌.definition: to be arrested by fear; restraint; scruple

畏縮.definition: to cower; to flinch; to quail; to recoil

畏縮不前.definition: to shrink back in fear (idiom); too cowardly to advance

畏罪.definition: to dread punishment; afraid of being arrested for a crime

畏罪潛逃.definition: to flee to escape punishment; to abscond from justice

畏罪自殺.definition: to commit suicide to escape punishment

畏途.definition: dangerous road; (fig.) perilous or intimidating undertaking

畏首畏尾.definition: afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous; afraid of the slightest thing
